com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.experimental.stateful

Interface State

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IdleModifierState, OneTransitionState, RangeFilterState, RegexTransitionState

    public interface State
    Represents the state of a StatefulModifier. It carries out the actual work of the StatefulModifier. Additionally, the return value of modify(StringBuilder, int, boolean) defines the next state of the StatefulModifier.
    Since:
    14.09.2011
    Author:
    rwoo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StatefulAfterModification modify(StringBuilder characterBuffer, int firstModifiableCharacterInBuffer, boolean endOfStreamHit)
      Does the same as Modifier.modify(StringBuilder, int, boolean) but, additionally, the returned result contains the new state for the StatefulModifier.

    • Method Detail

      • modify

        StatefulAfterModification modify(StringBuilder characterBuffer,
                                 int firstModifiableCharacterInBuffer,
                                 boolean endOfStreamHit)
        Does the same as Modifier.modify(StringBuilder, int, boolean) but, additionally, the returned result contains the new state for the StatefulModifier.
